title: Omics Resources
description: Provides some resources based on Bioconductor ecosystem.

tags.name: gds-format
tags.title: GDS format
tags.description: Data are in Genomic Data Structure format (GDS).

tags.name: bioc
tags.title: Bioconductor
tags.description: Data formats and processing tools are provided by [Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org/).

forms.name: gridfs-gds-file
forms.title: GDS data file - MongoDB GridFS
forms.description: File resource in Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS. The file will be downloaded from the GridFS file store of a MongoDB server.

items.title: Host
items.description: Remote host name or IP address of the MongoDB server.

items.title: Format
items.description: Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS.

forms.name: http-gds-file
forms.title: GDS data file - HTTP
forms.description: File resource in Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS. The file will be downloaded from a HTTP server.

items.title: Format
items.description: Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS.

credentials.description: Credentials are optional. If provided, `Basic` authorization header is applied.

forms.name: local-gds-file
forms.title: GDS data file - local
forms.description: File resource in Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS. The file is located in the R server file system.

items.title: Format
items.description: Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS.

credentials.description: No credentials required: the file must be accessible from the R server.

forms.name: opal-gds-file
forms.title: GDS data file - Opal
forms.description: File resource in Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS. The file will be downloaded from the file store of a Opal server.

items.title: Path
items.description: Path to the file in the Opal server.

items.title: Format
items.description: Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS.

credentials.description: Credentials are required and is a [personal API access token](http://opaldoc.obiba.org/en/latest/web-user-guide/my-profile.html#personal-access-tokens).

items.title: Token
items.description: Personal access token, granting read access to the file.

forms.name: scp-gds-file
forms.title: GDS data file - SSH
forms.description: File resource in Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS. The file will be downloaded from a server accessible through SSH.

items.title: Host
items.description: Remote host name or IP address that exposes SSH entry point.

items.title: Path
items.description: Path to the file in the remote server.

items.title: Format
items.description: Genomic Data Structure (GDS) format or in a format that can be converted to GDS.

items.title: User name
items.description: Valid user name having SSH access.
